title: How do I connect my phone to a Wi-Fi network?
answer:
1. Go to Settings. Under Wireless & networks, touch Wi-Fi. 

 1. Turn on Wi-Fi to search for Wi-Fi networks in range. 

 1. [If Wi-Fi is turned on, your phone automatically searches for available Wi-Fi networks. Touch a network, and enter the password if prompted. After the connection is set up, you will be able to use the Wi-Fi network to access the Internet.]()
